document.discussion_title: Grey's Anatomy's Jessica Capshaw Shares Adorable Photo of Her New Daughter
document.topic_text: Grey's Anatomy's Jessica Capshaw Shares Adorable Photo of Her New Daughter Comment Posted May. 10, 2016 at 10:08 AM Updated at 1:50 PM Posted May 10, 2016 at 10:08 AM Updated at 1:50 PM Grey's Anatomy star Jessica Capshaw has given birth to a baby girl. Josephine Kate Gavigan was born on Monday, May 2, according to an Instagram post from Capshaw. "I am endlessly grateful for her safe arrival and my heart is so full of love that it threatens to burst...," the actress wrote alongside a picture of the newborn. Josephine is the fourth child for Capshaw and her husband, Christopher Gavigan, a co-founder of the Honest Company. They are already parents to son Luke Hudson, 8, and daughters Eve Augusta, 5, and Poppy James, 3. Capshaw announced her pregnancy in December. A photo posted by @jessicacapshaw on May 9, 2016 at 6:58pm PDT Congratulations to the growing family! Other Links From TVGuide.com
